H3.text: when was the first time the internet was used. 1969

A4.text: The first computers were connected in 1969

A5.text: The network was declared operational in 1971

A6.text: ARPANET development began with two network nodes interconnected on 29 October 1969

A7.text: By the end of 1971, 15 sites were connected to the young ARPANET
